The first thing I do when I begin testing a class is use the tools/Create J=
unit tests function that netbeans provides to layout a scaffolding of the j=
unit tests. I could save a lot of time in my testing if I knew of a way to =
customize the output of this function (beyond the given "customization" opt=
ions).  Does anyone know of a way that I can do this?
